alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 10:06AM CST until February 13 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CST Saturday the stage was 18 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 18 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
